channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flooding at the entrance of Glebe road, 15th January
item.description:
The drains are blocked at the entrance to glebe road, this issue has been reported before and is still an issue when it rains
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Glebe Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a large amount of standing water on Green St . It seems to be due to the drain being either blocked or completely full but it overflows on even the smallest amount of rainfall, 15th January
item.description:
Outside No51 Green St seems to be the source.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 15th January
item.description:
customer reporting a dangerous tree. I’m concerned because during recent high winds, the tree was visibly moving more than usual. Given the risk to public safety and nearby property, I’d like this inspected urgently and appropriate action taken. Please confirm receipt of this report and let me know what steps will be taken. I’m happy to provide photographs or further details if needed. Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 15th January
item.description:
Large pothole that has gotten bigger. This has damaged my tyre. Depth is disguised by puddle. Right in line for the tyre. Unavoidable due to vehicles coming the opposite way.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flood across road, 15th January
item.description:
Drain is obviously blocked, main problem is all the waves from the flood are going into a high-voltage switch cabinet, outside Ontic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple Potholes, 15th January
item.description:
Along the length of Little Herberts Road and Horsefair Street there are now 10+ big potholes that are getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Horsefair Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
